# Build folders
bin/
obj/
artifacts/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.userprefs

# Visual Studio IDE files
.vs/
*.sln.docstates

# Rider IDE files
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# MacOS and Linux cruft
.DS_Store
*.swp

# Auto-generated by MAUI for Android/iOS
*.apk
*.aab
*.ipa
*.app/
*.xcarchive/
*.xcuserstate
*.xcworkspace
build/

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
project.lock.json
project.assets.json
*.nuspec

# Xamarin/MAUI-related
*.apk
*.aab
*.keystore
*.pfx
*.plist
*.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3
*.maui.*
platforms/android/.gradle
platforms/android/.idea
platforms/android/local.properties
platforms/android/captures/
platforms/android/.cxx/

# Other IDE/OS stuff
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
